name: Crack Exam - Current affairs and General knowledge
description: App Features:-  1. Study Material : This category provides you important notes and information about important topics and current affairs and general knowledge with questions-answer.  2. Quiz : This category provides you time bound quiz based on Gk, current affairs and others. This also provide result and solution after give quiz.  3. Videos : This category provides you videos like conceptual videos, General Awareness Videos, Quiz Videos, Subject Explanatory Videos etc.  4. HINDI and ENGLISH : Material available both in Hindi and English.
